entry.title: 宁大军训杂谈
entry.content:
军训的意义——说在一切之前

军训，无可避免的，对于身体与精神上是双重的磨练。常听学院书记讲，军训的意义在于磨练意志与学习国防知识，然而，私以为，军训的

entry.title: AdcancedAlternative
entry.content:
increasingly -> incrementally / step by step
temporary -> interim
everywhere -> ubiquitous
charming -> glamorous
nice/good -> gorgeous/brilliant

entry.title: Words And Phrases
entry.content:
do continual improvement of sth. 持续改进
lost faith in sth. 对……失去信心
get mixed up in sth. 对……产生混淆
in hindsight 事后看来
commission v.委托n.委员会
et cetera. 等等
portfolio n.文件夹
balance beam 平衡木
in glad rags 盛装出席
tuxedo n.晚礼服
nominee n.候选人
stiff n.僵硬的
bump into 意外撞到
pale adj.苍白的
hiss v.发出嘘声，表达不满
wife-to-be n.未婚妻
firefly n.萤火虫
plead v.辩护，申辩
prosecution n.起诉
photon n.光子
occational adj.偶然的
comet n.彗星
